string.value: You have now reached Level 28, which means #p1002104# will be giving you your fourth assignment as an informant today. Head to #b#m104000000##k and meet with #b#p1002104##k.

Many reports have been filed concerning a bunch of depressed #o2230101#s in #m105040300#. This has to be the work of the puppeteer. Head over to #b#m105040300##k and talk to the person who first discovered this. They say it's a boy named #b#p1061019##k.

You look like you've been gaining a lot of EXP. I've received some new information. Apparently, the #b#o2230101#s in #m105040300# are suffering from depression. Don't you think it's closely related to the puppeteer...?

The person who first reported this finding was a boy named #b#p1061019##k. Go over to #b#m105040300##k and talk to him about the #o2230101#s, okay? If you find something that leads to the puppeteer, don't just attack right then and there. Make your way back here and let me know, and we'll plan from there.

Ah, hello there. Are you the one that #p1002104# was talking about? Nice to meet you! My name is #p1061019#, and I have been exploring Victoria Island in hopes of one day becoming stronger.

Haven't you gone to #b#m105040300##k yet? You know how to get there, right? #m105040300# is the dungeon located at the center of Victoria Island. There's a way that leads to that town wherever you are in Victoria Island. If you really can't find the way there, then you can take the #bVIP cab#k instead.
